title: Mükemmel Eşleşme
overview: Everyone knows the phrase - marriages are made in heaven. But sometimes the parents of the bride and groom try very hard in this. The parents of the main characters constantly said that it was time for them to start their own family and got a little fed up with such requests. Only a good partner is very difficult to find, and even more so if there is no such desire. The girl and the guy were quite satisfied with their lives and did not even plan to tie the knot in the near future. But they understand that they are no longer able to withstand the instructions from their relatives and will have to change something in their lives.
